SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gamestate

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gamestate.GameState
public class GameState extends Object
Represents the state of the game for the client side. It holds information about players, cards, scores, etc.
